title: Mobarena怪物竞技场如何防止苦力怕爆炸破坏
author: chenxiutao030
txt_content:
RT，我设置了怪物竞技场的配置文件如下，请问如何设置才能防止苦力怕自爆破坏掉竞技场里的方块建筑?  站内贴地址：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-117004-1-1.html




      clear-wave-before-next: true
      clear-boss-before-next: true
      clear-wave-before-boss: true
      soft-restore: true
      soft-restore-drops: false
      require-empty-inv-join: false
      require-empty-inv-spec: false
      hellhounds: true
      pvp-enabled: false
      monster-infight: false
      allow-teleporting: false
      spectate-on-death: true
      auto-respawn: true
      share-items-in-arena: true
      min-players: 1
      max-players: 6
      max-join-distance: 0
      first-wave-delay: 10
      wave-interval: 15
      final-wave: 20
      monster-limit: 200
      monster-exp: false
      keep-exp: false
      food-regen: true
      lock-food-level: true
      player-time-in-arena: pvpworld
      auto-ignite-tnt: false
      auto-start-timer: 60
      start-delay-timer: 0
      auto-ready: false
      use-class-chests: false
      display-waves-as-level: false
      display-timer-as-level: false
      use-scoreboards: true
      isolated-chat: false
      global-join-announce: false
      global-end-announce: false
      show-death-messages: true复制代码

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
配置文件内不是有这么一段么 
mobs:
    block-creeper-explosions: false ← 这里
    block-creeper-block-damage: true ← 和这里
    block-enderdragon-block-damage: false
    block-fireball-explosions: false
    block-fireball-block-damage: false
    disable-enderman-griefing: true
    block-painting-destroy: true
    block-creature-spawn: []
    anti-wolf-dumbness: false复制代码
